publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4774 Chris Ballance: Song for Peace—That the Parliament supports the Song for Peace project taking place on 21 September 2006, which celebrates the United Nations’ International Day of Peace; recognises the importance of initiatives promoting non-violence, anti-sectarianism and peace in Scotland and the rest of the United Kingdom; commends NASUWT, the largest union representing teachers and headteachers throughout the UK, Peace One Day and the Youth Music charity for their efforts in organising this event, and wishes the children from Balmerino Primary School, Fife, every success in singing "No Wars Will Stop Us Singing" in the Parliament on 21 September 2006.
S2M-4774 Song for Peace (lodged on 11 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Rob Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4774 Song for Peace (lodged on 11 September 2006) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4774 Song for Peace (lodged on 11 September 2006) Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*, Tricia Marwick*

S2M-4774 Chris Ballance: Song for Peace—That the Parliament supports the Song for Peace project taking place on 21 September 2006, which celebrates the United Nations’ International Day of Peace; recognises the importance of initiatives promoting non-violence, anti-sectarianism and peace in Scotland and the rest of the United Kingdom; commends NASUWT, the largest union representing teachers and headteachers throughout the UK, Peace One Day and the Youth Music charity for their efforts in organising this event, and wishes the children from Balmerino Primary School, Fife, every success in singing "No Wars Will Stop Us Singing" in the Parliament on 21 September 2006. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Rob Gibson, Patrick Harvie, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Robin Harper, Eleanor Scott, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Mr Mark Ruskell, Ms Sandra White, Trish Godman, Tommy Sheridan, Tricia Marwick, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4774 Song for Peace (lodged on 11 September 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4774 Song for Peace (lodged on 11 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-4774 Song for Peace (lodged on 11 September 2006) Mark Ballard*
